ModMetaData.name: Minerals
ModMetaData.author: zachary-foster
ModMetaData.description:
for RimWorld B18 Hardcore SK mod version 0.5.0
<size=24>Description</size>
This mod adds various mineral-related content. For example, it adds various minable crystals underground, obsidian and flint for weapons, and living coldstone and glowstone crystals.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/Minerals for detailed documentation.
